name: 你挖我補!! You dig, I fix!! （Global Game Jam 2020 Team A @ Taipei, Taiwan）
name_original: 你挖我補!! You dig, I fix!! （Global Game Jam 2020 Team A @ Taipei, Taiwan）
description:
遊戲背景是在監獄，身為典獄長的玩家必須防止囚犯破壞監獄逃脫。 The background of the game is in prison. Players are wardens who must prevent prisoners from destroying the prison and escape.

Global Game Jam 2020 Page

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/%E4%BD%A0%E6%8C%96%E6%88%91%E8%A3%9C-you-dig-i-fix-8
